title: Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort Announces Special Introductory RateTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort Announces Special Introductory Rate
The all-new Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort, opening in 2015 on the legendary Hollywood Beach Broadwalk in Hollywood, Florida, today announced an exclusive introductory offer, ‘Throwback to Paradise.’ In celebration of 1977, the year Jimmy Buffett’s famed song, “Margaritaville,” launched into stardom, the resort is offering their coastal-luxe oceanfront accommodations and two signature welcome margaritas for $197.70 for all stays through December 15, 2015.*
“We are excited to introduce Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort to guests for the first time,” said Cate Farmer, the resort’s general manager. “This offer provides guests with a unique way to experience Destination Paradise. We hope that their first experience leads to a lifetime of future visits.”
Guestroom Rendering at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort.
Guests booking the ‘Throwback to Paradise’ offer will enjoy all Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort has to offer, including an extensive lineup of on-site water recreation activities complete with three pools and a FlowRider® Double, multiple diverse restaurant and bar concepts with waterfront dining options, several on-site resort retail stores and, as would be expected, dynamic live entertainment.
*Offer valid for stays through December 15, 2015. Based on availability. Blackout dates may apply. Subject to additional fees and restrictions. Cannot be combined with any other offer. A standard daily resort fee of $15 will be applied to all reservations, which gives guests access to complimentary property-wide wireless internet, access to the state-of-the-art fitness center, two beach chairs and umbrella, bottled water, in-room coffee and local phone calls. Must be 21 years or over to consume alcoholic beverages.
Source:- Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort
